name: Seaforth Folk Festival (Dr. Hughes' Full Games)
name_original: Seaforth Folk Festival (Dr. Hughes' Full Games)
description:
Seaforth Folk Festival (Dr. Hughes' Full Games) is an adventure game developed by Dr. Hughes' Full Games. It came out on 20-10-2020.
You can play Seaforth Folk Festival (Dr. Hughes' Full Games) on Web. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
